attributes.action: Parental rights to be restored in uk hospitals & parents to have last say
attributes.additional_details: We as parents should not be stripped of our rights for wanting to help our ill child please consider bringing this forward in parliament to support & keep parental
attributes.background: I have created & started this petition to help restore parental rights in the UK & also for parents of termally ill children to have the last say in what happens to thier child (eg) further treatment life support etc...

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you mean by "Parental rights to be restored in uk hospitals & parents to have last say". 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
